ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: This research was supported by National Aeronautics and Space Administration (NASA) under OCO2 solicitation contract NNX15AJ37G. We would like to thank Chris Lu for the help in regridding soil carbon data. We appreciate the discussion with O. Hararuk, M. KJ, J. Jiang, P. Rayner, A. Schuh, and A. Chatterjee during development of the manuscript.
